channel.title: jupyter on SR-C
channel.description: Recent content in jupyter on SR-C

item.title: 在服务器安装Jupyter Notebook
item.description: 安装 使用conda安装简单方便 1 2 3 conda creat -n jupyter python=3.6 source activate jupyter conda install jupyter notebook 配置 1 2 3 jupyter notebook --generate-config ##生成配置文件 jupyter notebook password ##设置jupyter密码 vi ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py 设置如下 1 2
